title: Award-Winning Fiji Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining
description:
Experience barefoot luxury at its finest with an escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned properties and an absolute family favourite: Castaway Island, Fiji. Set on a pristine private island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this iconic resort is an award-winning haven surrounded by white-sand beaches and colourful coral reefs, easily accessible from Fiji's mainland with a scenic ferry transfer - available for purchase as an add-on at checkout.

Embrace the laidback island lifestyle staying in a traditional bure, with resort activities ranging from snorkelling to hiking and dolphin watching.

**Your handpicked inclusions**:

- Indulge with all-inclusive dining: daily breakfast, lunch and nightly dinner
- Enjoy a decadent high tea for two adults once during your stay
- Your choice of an exciting banana boat ride or snorkelling adventure on the outer reef for two adults and two children
- Two children (2-12) stay and eat free from the kids' menu

**Tripadvisor Travellers’ Choice, Best of the Best 2020** Top 25 Hotels for Families - South Pacific

**Out & About with Kids 2020 Readers’ Choice Awards** Best International Hotels & Resorts - Fiji

**Book with 100% Confidence**: If for whatever reason you don’t want to go on your holiday, you can cancel right up to 14 days before check-in and get a 100% credit to use at Luxury Escapes for any other accommodation offer. Excludes flights, see the Fine Print for details.
offer_address: Qailto Island, Mamanuca group of islands, Fiji 0000 Mamanuca Fiji

title: Award-Winning Fiji Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip International Flights with Fiji Airways for Two Adults
description:
Experience barefoot luxury at its finest with an escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned properties and an absolute family favourite: Castaway Island, Fiji. Set on a pristine private island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this iconic resort is an award-winning haven surrounded by white-sand beaches and colourful coral reefs.

Set sail from the mainland and step foot onto 174 acres of rainforest-draped bliss and embrace island life from your gorgeous thatched-roof bure, set moments from the water's edge. Listen to the ocean soundscape echo through the resort and indulge across your choice of four eateries, including the exceptional Asian-inspired Restaurant 1808. Enhanced by the warmth of tropical sunshine and renowned Fijian hospitality, this island oasis invites guests to curate their own escape through myriad resort activities; explore the translucent shores by paddleboard or kayak, align your chakras with a sunrise yoga session or head into the hinterland on a guided nature walk.

title: Award-Winning Fiji Island Paradise with All-Inclusive Dining & Roundtrip International Flights for Two Adults
description:
Experience barefoot luxury at its finest with an escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned properties and an absolute family favourite: Castaway Island, Fiji. Set on a pristine private island in the Mamanuca archipelago, this iconic resort is an award-winning haven (named among the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor) surrounded by white-sand beaches and colourful coral reefs.

Set sail from the mainland, step foot onto 174 acres of rainforest-draped bliss and embrace island life from your gorgeous thatched-roof bure, set moments from the water's edge. Listen to the ocean soundscape echo through the resort and indulge across your choice of four eateries, including the exceptional Asian-inspired Restaurant 1808. Enhanced by the warmth of tropical sunshine and renowned Fijian hospitality, this island oasis invites guests to curate their own escape through myriad resort activities; explore the translucent shores by paddleboard or kayak, align your chakras with a sunrise yoga session or head into the hinterland on a guided nature walk.

title: All-Inclusive Dining: Island Paradise in Fiji
description: Set your watch to island time and escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned island getaways, Castaway Island Resort. Embrace laid-back Fiji life staying in a traditional bure with all-inclusive dining (full buffet breakfast, delicious à la carte and themed buffet lunches and dinners), one high tea for two and your choice of two Happiness Passes, offering exclusive experiences such as dolphin safaris, a romantic beach dinner with sparkling wine, tropical Lailai massages and more. Plus, two kids (aged 12 years and under) stay and eat free!
offer_address: Qailto Island, Mamanuca group of islands, Fiji 0000 Mamanuca Fiji

title: Award-Winning Castaway Island Paradise
description:
Experience barefoot luxury at its finest with an escape to one of Fiji’s most renowned properties and an absolute family favourite: Castaway Island, Fiji. Set on a pristine private island surrounded by white-sand beaches and colourful coral reefs in the Mamanuca archipelago, this iconic resort is ranked in the top 1% of properties worldwide on Tripadvisor.

Set sail from the mainland and step foot onto 174 acres of rainforest-draped bliss and embrace island life from your gorgeous thatched-roof bure, set moments from the water's edge. Listen to the ocean soundscape echo through the resort and indulge across your choice of four eateries, including the exceptional Asian-inspired Restaurant 1808. Enhanced by the warmth of tropical sunshine and renowned Fijian hospitality, this island oasis invites guests to curate their own escape through myriad resort activities; explore the translucent shores by paddleboard or kayak, align your chakras with a sunrise yoga session, or head into the hinterland on a guided nature walk.
